_header: Welcome and yet more welcome by this light
_description:
Charles d’Orléans, On News of his Mistress, translated from the French (Champollion-Figeac (1842)
XChampollion-Figeac, Aime. Les Poesies du duc Charles d’Orleans. Paris, 1842, 101) — three 9-line stanzas (ababbbcbc) and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
WElcome and yit more welcome bi þis lightO fresshe tidyngis
                    vnto myn hert are ye…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…This refrayt which y loue right hertilyTeys yow to whom y
                    loue am and no mo
